availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry P. Montgomery (Gallatin County, Kentucky, school teacher.)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, school teacher. Kentucky native. Son of John Montgomery. Married to Nancy E. Kenney Montgomery in Owen County, Kentucky on January 13, 1864. School teacher in Gallatin County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 168A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 574.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272776, p. 90 (on microfilm), (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Henry Partlow Montgomery (8 Feb 1839-7 Nov 1905)," Memorial #70970762, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70970762 (accessed June 17, 2020).
